mean_cn: adj. 报复性的，怀恨的，惩罚的
mean_en: having or showing a desire to hurt someone who has hurt or caused problems for you
word_etyma: vin力量+dict说+ive形容词后缀 → 有报复心的
short_phrase: a vindictive man with a knife
sentence: He was so vindictive, even after many years his desire for revenge was undimmed.
sentence_trans: 他报复心太强了，即使过了多年，他复仇的渴望仍然没有减弱。
